Docs.summary: One-shot read as an asynchronous operation. Initiates read and waits for it to finish. Async API was required as reading in 16bit resolution can take more than 60ms.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void SetAsyncThreshold(int32 thresh) cil managed
Public Shared Sub SetAsyncThreshold (thresh As Integer)

Docs.summary: Sets the lower time limit in ms. If the current configuration reads data faster the synchronous API is used. This can save some overhead.
Docs.remarks: The default configuration is 20ms. This means that only in 16 bit resolution read waits asynchronously. Setting it to 0 or lower disables the function.
